comments.text:
C.A.P- He is the leader with the black hair
L.Joe- The one with the blonde and blue hair
Changjo- The youngest member with the red hair
Chunji- Completely blonde one
Ricky- Completely blue haired one
Niel- One with the brown hair
Enjoy :)
comments.author: Purple1 5Kpop (Purple15Panther)

comments.text:
Welcome to the fandom ^_^
0:05 C.A.P ( the leader, main rapper)
0:19 L.Joe (lead rapper)
0:33 Niel (main vocalist)
0:40 Chunji (lead vocalist)
0:46 Ricky (lead dancer, vocalist)
0:48 Changjo (maknae, main dancer, vocalist)
They are extremely cute and funny offstage, i recommend you to watch them 
on weekly idol and other variety shows, you wont ragretXD
and Niel has his solo debut lately with oNIELy, i hope you check out 
lovekiller ;)
Their official YT channel is TeensOnTop and the fandom called Angel ^^
